m_gametext: ['Warrior', '剣士（イギリス）', '', '剣士（簡体字）', '剣士（繁体字）', '剣士（韓国）', '剣士（フランス）', '剣士（ドイツ）', '剣士（スペイン）', '剣士（ラテン）', '剣士（イタリア）', '剣士（オランダ）']

['Former student of botany in Atlasdam. Currently
traveling from region to region researching a
botanical encyclopedia.

Though naïve and indifferent to anything but research,
she is easygoing by nature and loved by her companions.', 'キャラ情報テスト（イギリス）', '', 'キャラ情報テスト（簡体字）', 'キャラ情報テスト（繁体字）', 'キャラ情報テスト（韓国）', 'キャラ情報テスト（フランス）', 'キャラ情報テスト（ドイツ）', 'キャラ情報テスト（スペイン）', 'キャラ情報テスト（ラテン）', 'キャラ情報テスト（イタリア）', 'キャラ情報テスト（オランダ）']

["Female warrior of the Rippletide town watch.

She took up the blade to follow in her father's footsteps,
but is plagued by self-doubt. She has yet to awaken
to her own abilities.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Male hunter with a burning vendetta against monsters,
particularly ratkin.

Though taciturn, as his name suggests, if he accepts
a commission he sees it through to the bitter end.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Master jeweler of impeccable discernment.

Many are the nobles who long to engage his
services exclusively, but he enjoys freedom too
much to accept any such offer.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Cleric of the Order of the Sacred Flame.

He cannot ignore distress or suffering and will
offer his hand to anyone in need. This kindness
has won him a devoted following.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Thrill-seeking female thief wrapped in enigma.

"Everything you took, I'll take back—with
interest," is her watchword. Rumor has it that
those who defy her in any way lose everything,
even their life.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Grandson and favored apprentice of the famed
apothecary Pollonia.

His unhurried bedside manner is a balm for body
and soul alike that can put any patient at ease.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Dancer traveling Orsterra researching regional
traditions in order to start her own troupe one day.

Her dancing has bewitched audiences by the score,
but she remains humble and dedicated to her craft.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Young bandit who dreams of being a benevolent
picaroon.

He normally keeps his emotions hidden, but he
despises evil with a violent fury and loathes those
who torment the weak.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Emberglow barfly who always drinks alone.

No matter how much drink he puts away, his eyes
stay sharp and his guard stays up.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Thief who roams the continent plying his trade.

"Stand with the weak and against the powerful"
is his creed. He steals only from the wicked, and
the common folk revere him as a hero.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Young merchant who, oddly enough, loathes the
business world.

His words drip with sarcasm, but deep down he is
as chivalrous as his appraiser's eye is expert. He has
exposed the iniquities of too many crooked
merchants to count.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Sociologist conducting field research with the goal of
eliminating the wealth gap.

Though sincere and diligent, he can suffer from
excessive zeal that leads him astray.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Aged scholar who quests tirelessly across Orsterra
in search of ancient ruins.

This inveterate adventurer's vigor belies his venerable
years as he roams from ruin to ruin.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Scholar on a voyage of discovery she hopes will teach
her enough to join the Archaeological Society.

With her prodigious passion for the past, expectations
are high for her career at the Royal Academy.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Hunter who specializes in monsters.

Descended from a tribe of monster tamers, he is
preternaturally sensitive to the presence of monsters.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Female warrior who earns her crust as a bodyguard
and monster exterminator.

Her stoic, valiant demeanor evaporates when the
topic turns to cooking, about which she is enthusiastic
and loquacious. Her dream is to open her own restaurant.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Male warrior in a distinctive red turban. Grandson
of the Crimson Blade.

Frank and open-hearted, he cannot walk past
someone in need.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Female warrior with exceptional mastery of the blade.

A disciple of Gundahar, the blademaster, she is on a
journey of cultivation to become worthy of her lineage.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Deacon spreading the teachings of the Sacred Flame
in Clearbrook with her friend Jessica.

She works tirelessly for the village and its people,
fueled by an inborn eager stick-to-itiveness.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Hunter who specializes in monsters with bounties
on them.

Right now he is on the trail of the monster with
the greatest bounty of all: the One-eyed Wolf.
He is surprisingly family-minded.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Male member of the Knights Ardante.

Though still a novice, he is dedicated to his duties
and throws himself into the most arduous missions
with unfailing determination.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Woman who was formerly one of the Silver Arrows,
a legendary band of hunters.

Though curt and gruff in word and deed, she has
a kind heart. Her zeal for self-improvement is driven
by the desire to protect others.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Hunter traveling with her two children, Connor and Marie.

She is a single mother whose hunting is the family's
source of income.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Thief who keeps her expression completely hidden
behind a mask.

She is exquisitely unfriendly, but does first-rate work.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Member of the Rock Firm, handling distribution
in Cragspear.

A born leader trusted implicitly by her subordinates,
she is currently traveling to learn more about the
world on the recommendation of her own boss.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Head of the Lamas Company in Sunshade.

Since the death of her father, the previous company
head, she has kept things running with the support
of her employees despite her tender years.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Newly minted merchant with nothing but the coat
on his back who dreams of making it big.

Many are drawn to his hearty, unfailingly confident manner.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Cleric who roams the continent's ports,
blessing ships and praying for safety at sea.

Their prayers draw on a wealth of marine knowledge,
but they are often mistaken for a child due to their
appearance and way of speaking.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Priest thought to have a bright future ahead of him
in the now-fallen Kingdom of Hornburg.

Now, robbed of his home by the ravages of war,
he innocently roams the land.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Up-and-coming historian at the Royal Academy
of Atlasdam.

Her research is driven by misapprehensions so
severe they verge on total fantasy.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Girl who grew up in an orphanage managed
by the church.

Always bright and cheerful, she is traveling to
raise funds for her orphanage, which has run
into budgetary difficulties.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Scioness of local nobility who has fallen on hard times.
Conscious of her noblesse oblige, she strives to work
for her people.

She is traveling to gain the knowledge and procure
the capital to open a big medicinal herb garden.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Apothecary traveling to share knowledge of how
to treat Grace Fever, a communicable disease.

He struggles constantly to dispel the haze of popular
superstition around medical treatment.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Hard-working, conscientious woman traveling
the continent to hone her skills as an apothecary.

Her beauty attracts many male admirers, and she
is often caught up in squabbles between them.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Novice apothecary still learning the ropes.

Though unfailingly serious and devoted to her
studies, she is often led into serious error by poor
assumptions. Even so, she never loses heart.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Up-and-coming dancer who performs in taverns
on his travels.

His preening narcissism puts potential patrons off,
but his skill as a dancer is genuine.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Dancer with striking blue hair.

She used to be a star in Sunshade, but, for some
reason, seldom takes the stage anymore.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Female dancer who has wandered from town
to town to town.

Though oddly conversant with the affairs
of the nobility, she artfully deflects all questions
about why this should be.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Girl who dreams of being the greatest dancer
on the continent.

Pure-hearted and gentle, she cannot ignore
someone in distress, which has won her many fans.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Scholar and second brother of a set of octuplets.

Though somewhat timid, he is diligent and serious
about putting in the work to be a great academic.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Female scholar and graduate of the
Royal Academy of Atlasdam.

She majored in ancient history at the Academy,
where her dogged persistence as a researcher
was noted with approval.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Scholar from the distant Red Valley making
a ceremonial journey to mark his entry to adulthood.

...In theory. At present, he is so fascinated by
marine life that his original objectives have
long since fallen by the wayside.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Warrior and eldest sister of a set of octuplets.

She tends to take anyone she meets under her
wing, perhaps due to having led the family as the
oldest sibling.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Woman warrior who wanders the world with
book in hand.

An incorrigible bookworm, she longs one day
to have an exciting adventure like the heroine
of a novel.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Warrior from the distant Red Valley making
a ceremonial journey to mark his entry to adulthood.

Blessed with a mellow, laid-back personality,
he loves sleeping and eating above all else.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Hunter and third sister of a set of octuplets.

A notorious crybaby, she is constantly weeping
from either joy or sadness.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Cheerful, lively female hunter.

She cares for her family back home very much,
and is searching for a fine husband to make
them happy.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Hunter from the distant Red Valley making
a ceremonial journey to mark his entry to adulthood.

He often makes mistakes after getting carried away,
but never lets this stop him from trying again.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Merchant and second sister of a set of octuplets.

She is so used to putting up a tough front in
business that she finds it hard to open up.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Merchant ever gazing at the sky and sea.

Unhurried by nature, she hates to rush anything.
She has confidence in her powers of observation
and memory and puts them to good use professionally.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Merchant from the distant Red Valley making
a ceremonial journey to mark his entry to adulthood.

He is plagued by timidity and anxiety he hopes
to one day overcome.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Cleric and eldest brother in a set of octuplets.

A lazy fellow who likes to let the gods take the reins.
However, he is charming and affectionate enough
to win over the people of the church.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Itinerant cleric of the Sacred Flame.

She can be abrupt and abrasive, but when she loves
something, she really loves it.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Cleric from the distant Red Valley making a
ceremonial journey to mark his entry to adulthood.

He is a model man of the cloth who cannot ignore
a cry for help.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Thief and third brother of a set of octuplets.

He visits the tavern daily in search of tips for
becoming the dashing folk hero he longs to be.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Female thief of considerable skill.

Despite her tender years, she has pulled off many
a heist, but is quite naïve when it comes to anything
other than thievery.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Thief from the distant Red Valley making a
ceremonial journey to mark his entry to adulthood.

He aims for perfection in all things, but his skills
do not match his overweening self-confidence.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Apothecary and youngest sister of a set of octuplets.

Stubborn and hard-working, she is so determined
to do everything herself that she tends to instinctively
reject offers of assistance.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Traveling female apothecary.

Deeply versed in mountain lore, she has a sharp eye
for everything from edible nuts to medicinal herbs.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Apothecary from the distant Red Valley making
a ceremonial journey to mark his entry to adulthood.

Impatient and prone to trip himself up, he is also
quick to get back on his feet and set out running again.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Dancer and youngest brother of a set of octuplets.

He longs to be a cool, stylish dancer, but is too cute
to pull the look off. This vexes him greatly.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Itinerant dancer who has her sights set on being
the best on the continent.

Her bewitching moves have won over more than
a few fervent fans.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Dancer from the distant Red Valley making a
ceremonial journey to mark his entry to adulthood.

He is fascinated by the local dances in every
region he visits.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A traveling swordsman seeking an adventure
fit for a knight.

Pure of heart and trusting to a fault, he is proud
of his knightly status and faces every challenge
that comes his way with faith and sincerity.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A cleric who preaches the wonders of having
faith in others.

She tends to make one blunder after another
in her haste, but seems to have no intention
of slowing down.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A dancer living in Sunshade. Her footwork is as
flawless as her beauty, bewitching many.

Though a member of a powerful noble family,
she has come to the tavern with certain goals in mind.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['As the only child of the Colziones, this girl
can usually be found helping out at the
Colzione Family Provisioners.

Her gift for seeing the hidden value in merchandise
has impressed those around her.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A young man working as an apothecary in
the town of Clearbrook.

A traveling apothecary saved his life when he
was young, and now he aspires to be just like him—
roaming the continent and helping all in need.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['One of the last remaining members of a tribe
of hunters who live in harmony with the beasts
of the Darkwood.

Though still in training, she has formidable innate
talent. Her hunting companion is a snow leopard
named Linde.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A scholar working at the Royal Academy of
Atlasdam.

With an endless thirst for knowledge, he works
tirelessly as a professor to enlighten as many
pupils as he can. He is a popular lecturer, not
only because his lessons are easy to understand,
but also because of his comely appearance.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A solitary thief whose origins and motivations
are shrouded in mystery.

As a master of disguise and infiltration, seemingly
able to appear at will wherever he pleases, he
strikes terror into the highborn and wealthy.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A hunter who travels with his
faithful direwolf companion, Hägen.

Though he seems like a playful man on the surface,
his hunting skills are second to none, and his
unprecedented feat of slaying a dragon is touted
as legend throughout the land.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A member of the distinguished House Shermot.
Her refinement is audible in her speech.

She appears docile and reserved, but acts with
a determination and follow-through that puts
adults to shame.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A compassionate cleric who wishes to help those
suffering in solitude open their hearts again.

She is the daughter of Archbishop Josef and
strives to make him proud by being the best
cleric she can be.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Butler to House Ravus, one of the most powerful
landed families in Bolderfall.

His current travels through Orsterra are
on the orders of his mistress, Cordelia.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['An itinerant apothecary who roams Orsterra
healing the sick.

She is driven by the need to save as many
unwell people as she can, which may be why
her face is always the picture of seriousness.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A traveling harlequin bringing smiles to all
he meets.

His popular street performances are well known
for being extremely entertaining, and he will gladly
go to any lengths to make his audience smile.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A scholar with an acute curiosity in caits.

The self-proclaimed authority on caitology,
she has made numerous attempts to capture
the cunning creatures, only to be eluded every
time. Regardless, her enthusiasm and expertise
are genuine.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A brilliant military commander, hailed as a prodigy
from a young age and all but unbeatable on
the battlefield.

Supremely self-confident, he dismisses most others
as dullards and fools, but readily acknowledges
those who have strengths he lacks.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Master of the double dagger Bladed Wings
technique passed down in the west.

With skills sharpened to a razor's edge by her
master's teachings, she uses her daggers to
strike down any who stand against her.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Daughter of Woodward, former captain
of the Knights Ardante.

Comrades in arms and novices alike admire her
keen sense of duty and caring nature. She cannot
visit an area without striving to resolve its problems.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A scholar who was formerly a resident at the
Royal Academy.

Dapper and dependable by nature, she left
the academy out of disgust at its internal power
struggles. She has roamed Orsterra since then,
continuing her research.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A cleric with a devoted following among the
people of Donescu.

His words may have a barely concealed venomous
edge, and his ways may be utterly unbefitting
of a man of the cloth, but something draws people
to him nonetheless.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A tailor who prizes originality.

Though often treated like a joke due to her
bizarre wares, this is the result of her determination
to make clothing no one else can. Her talent is the
real thing.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["A thief in pursuit of the Red Hat's legends.

While some may find themselves annoyed with
her whimsical ways, others are inspired by her
unshakable convictions.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A mercenary who wanders from war zone to
war zone across the world.

Brisk, confident, and deadly with a sword,
she has racked up many a victory in the arena.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["A hunter-for-hire who has served many masters.

He isn't afraid to get his hands dirty to get the
job done. Despite being feared in the underworld,
however, he is surprisingly well-liked by children.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['This dancer seeks beauty to thrill the heart.

People call him the Dashing Dance Duelist.
He may seem flippant and mercurial, but in fact
his every deed is rooted in deeply held beliefs.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Also known as the battle-hardened
apothecary, she has both a sisterly
disposition and a chivalrous spirit.

After being saved by a devoted apothecary
in her youth, she decided to dedicate her life
to walking the same path—that of a healer.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["A priestess visiting Orsterra from a country
far to the east.

This young maiden's mystical, almost otherworldly
exterior belies a core of iron and a courageous,
generous spirit that little can faze.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['An outlander swordsman who came from a
distant eastern country as bodyguard to a priestess.

Though serious to a fault, his blade-handling is
first-class. Many call him the strongest of his tribe.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A swordslinging young girl from another world.

Her innate sense of justice and swift swordwork
have gotten her and her companions out of many
scrapes. If she has a weakness, it is her fondness
for fine food.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A vestal of the Wind Crystal in another world.

Serious about the responsibility she bears, she
holds nothing back when fighting those who
defy her principles.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A scholar from another world.

He set out on a quest for the Asterisks he needs
to decipher a magical tome inherited from his teacher.
Unfailingly positive and always up for a drink.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['An able mercenary from another world.

Intensely curious, she takes childlike delight in
new discoveries. About herself, however, she rarely
speaks, leaving many mysteries unresolved.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
